resources.string: Swipe Up to Start the Tutorial
Swipe Down to Skip the Tutorial
Hold this button to Start the Tutorial
Hold this button to Skip the Tutorial

This tutorial will guide you to Navigate and Access the Content of this Application, At any point of tutorial use skip button at buttom to skip through the tutorial. Double Tap on "Start Button" to begin the tutorial
Welcome to cognitive mode, scroll up and down for more selection. Make your selections by pressing and holding on the button
There are no more categories beyond this point, please swipe right to access the previous category
There are no more categories beyond this point, please swipe left to access the next category
There are no more questions beyond this point, please swipe right to access the previous questions
There are no more questions beyond this point, please swipe left to access the next questions
There are no more questions beyond this point, please swipe up to access questions
There are no more categories beyond this point, please swipe down to access categories
Please double tap the button to begin or skip the tutorial
